dc.title: The Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration - Homepage
dc.description: SAMHSA works to improve the quality and availability of substance abuse prevention, alcohol and drug addiction treatment, and mental health services. Includes links to community programs, information resources, events and articles.
